Package com.cafean.rpc

Class RPCOriginator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafean.rpc.RPCManager
      • com.cafean.rpc.RPCOriginator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CalcServerOriginator, ConfigToolOriginator, JobStatusOriginator, ModelEditorOriginator
    public class RPCOriginator
extends RPCManager
    This class implements the client side "connector" for the CAFEAN RPC system. Once initialized, the RPCOriginator can be used to create RPCRequester instances to communicate with the specified host and port.

    The server side "listener" is implemented by RPCListener.

    See Also:
    RPCRequester

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a new originator for requesters and responders connected to the given host/port.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RPCOriginator

        public RPCOriginator​(java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String ioPackage,
                     java.lang.String host,
                     int port)
        Creates a new originator for requesters and responders connected to the given host/port.
        Parameters:
        name - a String containing the name of this originator.
        ioPackage - a String containing the path of the package containing the PibBlock classes that will be used as remote commands by this originator.
        host - a String containing the host name (or IP) of the server that this originator will communicate with.
        port - the port on the server that this originator will connect to.

    • Method Detail

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Returns true if this originator has any initialized connections. Note that connections that are not fully initialized are not considered connected.

      • createRequester

        public RPCRequester createRequester()
                             throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                                    java.io.IOException
        Creates a new requester for use in communicating with the target host/port of this originator.
        Returns:
        an RPCRequester connected to the target of this originator
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException
        java.io.IOException

      • getTargetHost

        public java.lang.String getTargetHost()
        returns the host specified as the target of this originator

      • getTargetPort

        public int getTargetPort()
        returns the port specified as the target of this originator
